    <h2>The Creator And Our Story</h2>
    <p>
      My Name Is Bobby, I Started Sz Games Because I Wanted A Place Where I Could Play Unblocked Games And Without There Being A Million Ads Being Shown To Me While Im Playing Games, I Started Making The Site On October 20th 2022 And It Has Come A Long Way Since Then.
    </p>

    

    <h3>What Sz In Sz Games Stands For:</h3>
    <p>
      "Sz" Never Really Meant Anything, I Came Up With It Because It Was Easy To Remember And Wasn't Long.
    </p>

    <h2>What I Plan To Do In The Future</h2>
    <p>
      I Will Continue To Update The Site And Keep Ads Minimal, I Will Never Put Ads In Any Of Our Games.
    </p>
